title: Pisco Sour II
directions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice and shake vigorously until egg white is incorporated. Strain into martini glasses.
ingredients: 3 ounces (2 jiggers or about 1/3 cup) Pisco
3 ounces (2 jiggers or about 1/3 cup) sweet-and-sour mix
1 teaspoon powdered egg white (do not reconstitute) or 1 egg white
